isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - Before 12/06/1994 - MAINTENANCE - SIGHT GLASS CHECK OF THE SYSTEM CHARGE

svcproc.title: SIGHT GLASS CHECK OF THE SYSTEM CHARGE

step1.para: Operate system and determine if there is some cooling. If not, refer to GROUP 16 - AIR CONDITIONING THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.

Observe the sight glass in the receiver-dehydrator for bubbles ( Figure 8). The sight glass should appear clear. If not, refer to GROUP 16 - AIR CONDITIONING THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. SIGHT GLASS BUBBLES - SYSTEM NEEDS CHARGE

step1.para: Shut off the engine and check the air conditioning system for refrigerant leaks using an electronic leak detector. Follow the equipment manufacturer's instructions.
